name: GIF Resource Collection
description:
Just two simple GIFs you're welcome to use for your own projects. You can also export them using Rogie's Export GIF plugin.


1. Swipe Hints. A helpful animation of a touch cursor sliding across a screen to help let your users know they need to swipe.


2. Check Mark. A completing check mark animation, using nice simple easing curves similar to those in material design.


If you've got ideas for more you'd like to see, please let me know.
